Index » Bundle

Class: Bundle

Defined in: lib\src\Konsserto\Component\Bundle\Bundle.coffee

Overview

Bundle is the root for all bundles It contains :

  • helpers
  • convention named directories
  • boot & shutdown process

Author:

  • Jessym Reziga jessym@konsserto.com

Direct Known Subclasses

FrameworkBundle TwigBundle

Variables Summary

CONTROLLER_DIR = 
'Controller'

Controller's directory's name in Bundle hierarchy

RESOURCES_DIR = 
'Resources'

Resources' directory's name in Bundle hierarchy

ENTITY_DIR = 
'Entity'

Entity's directory's name in Bundle hierarchy

COMMAND_DIR = 
'Command'

Command's directory's name in Bundle hierarchy

MIDDLEWARE_DIR = 
'Middleware'

Middleware's directory's name in Bundle hierarchy
